articles.title: Prime Minister of DR Congo Meets DPRK Government Delegation
articles.content:
Prime Minister of DR Congo Meets DPRK Government Delegation
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Augustin Matata Ponyo, prime minister of the Democratic Republic of Congo, met and had a talk with the DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on a visit to his country at his office on Aug. 19.
					He mentioned the great exploits the preceding leaders of the DPRK performed on behalf of the times and history.
					
					He sincerely congratulated the DPRK on its big achievements under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					He reiterated his will to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition, hoping that the multi-faceted cooperation with the DPRK would be promoted.
					
					He extended support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					Present there from the DPRK side were members of the DPRK government delegation on a visit to the DR Congo and the DPRK ambassador to the country and from the side of the DR Congo the acting minister of Foreign Affairs, International Cooperation and Francophone Affairs and the advisor on foreign affairs of the prime minister's office.

articles.title: Oratorical Meeting of Officials, Members of GFTUK Held
articles.content:
Oratorical Meeting of Officials, Members of GFTUK Held
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A national oratorical meeting was held by officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) here on Wednesday on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					Present there were Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., GFTUK, and officials and members of the GFTUK.
					
					Performers praised Kim Jong Il for providing the invincible military muscle and bringing about history-making miracles and change in the confrontation with the imperialists and the U.S. and the building of a thriving nation through his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					They said about the Songun revolutionary records of Kim Jong Il, who visited every nook and corner of the country despite cold wind, rain and snow, kindled the torch of great surge and aroused all the service personnel and people to perform miracles and feats.
					
					They vowed to devote their patriotic mind to building a thriving nation as required by the stirring era in the spirit of the historic 2013 March plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					They called for eternally glorifying the invincible history and tradition of Songun Korea and performing bigger miracles and feats in the general offensive for economic construction and the improvement of standard of people's living at the "speed on Masik Pass" under the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: 3rd Rason Int'l Trade Exhibition under Way
articles.content:
3rd Rason Int'l Trade Exhibition under Way
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The 3rd Rason International Trade Exhibition is going on in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					The exhibition in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone bordering China and Russia is attended by more than 120 entities from countries and regions, including the DPRK, China, Russia, Germany, the U.S., and Japan.
					
					On display at the exhibition are some 78 000 items of exhibits in 410 kinds, covering machinery, steel, electrical, electronic and chemical products, foodstuffs, medicines, building materials, vehicles and sundries.
					
					In this regard, KCNA met Hwang Chol Nam, vice-chairman of the Rason City People's Committee.
					
					Hwang said:
					
					The Rason City has laid definite institutional guarantee and legal foundations for jointly developing the economic and trade zone and has made a big stride in building infrastructure, paving a way for foreign businesses to smoothly carry on production and trade in the zone.
					
					During the days of the exhibition, foreign businessmen will witness the situation of the developing zone.
					
					Ho Myong Ho, director of the Rason Exhibition Corporation, told KCNA that the current exhibition is the biggest in scale and he believes that it will serve as an occasion for making the trade in the zone gain momentum. 
					
					The exhibition will run until August 23.
					
					The Rason Economic and Trade Zone is a special economic zone in the DPRK, where preferential treatment is available.
					
					The zone has developed into a hub for transit transport, trade and investment and financial and tourism service.

articles.title: New Stamps off Press in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps off Press in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued new stamps (a sheet and an individual stamp) featuring the 7th Congress of the Korean Children's Union.
					The sheet shows a picture of Marshal Kim Jong Un acknowledging the cheering participants in the congress held on June 6, the union's anniversary.
					
					Seen in the individual stamp are a member of the union trumpeting against the background of sunflower and the emblem of the union, as well as the slogan "Let us be always ready for socialist country!"

articles.title: New Posters Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
New Posters Produced in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out posters encouraging the army and people of the DPRK to turn out in building an economic power.
					Poster "Let's make great leap forward and innovations across the country at the 'speed on Masik Pass'" depicts a soldier-builder calling upon all service personnel and people to work fresh miracles against the background of the construction site of the Ski Resort on Masik Pass.
					
					It earnestly calls upon all party members, service personnel and other people to create the second and third speed on Masik Pass in different parts of the country in hearty response to the WPK's plan for building a thriving nation.
					
					Another poster is "Let's make Kosan Fruit Farm a land of bliss under socialism where 'sea of apple trees spread at the foot of Chol Pass'". This reflects the enthusiasm to turn the farm into a large-scale fruit producer to keep up with the demand in the new century as early as possible.

articles.title: National Workers' Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
National Workers' Sports Contest Opens
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- An opening meeting of a national sports contest of workers was held here on Wednesday on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					Men's football, table-tennis, defence sports and athletic events will be held during the contest which will run through August 28.
					
					The contest offers an important occasion for workers to popularize sports, make it part of their daily life and powerfully demonstrate their high spirit and revolutionary optimism in the building of an economic power and a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					There were men's football matches between the teams of the Capital City Construction Committee and the Ministry of Railways and between teams of North Phyongan Province and South Hwanghae Province as well as group table-tennis matches between teams of South Phyongan Province and Jagang Province and between teams of Kangwon Province and Ryanggang Province on the same day.

articles.title: Premier Men's Soccer League Matches Go on in DPRK
articles.content:
Premier Men's Soccer League Matches Go on in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Premier men's soccer league matches are going on at Kim Il Sung Stadium of the DPRK as part of the celebrations of the Youth Day, further raising the hot wind of sports.
					There took place matches between the Pyongyang Team and the Myohyangsan Team and between the Hwaebul Team and the April 25 Team on Wednesday.
					
					The Pyongyang Team beat its rival 3:2 and the Hwaebul Team won its rival 1:0.
					
					There also took place matches between the Kigwancha Team and the Wolmido Team, between the Team of the Ministry of Light Industry and the Amnokgang Team and between the Sonbong Team and the Rimyongsu Team on Tuesday.
					
					The Kigwancha Team trounced its rival 3:1 and the Team of the Ministry of Light Industry and the Amnokgang Team ended in a 1:1 tie. The Sonbong Team which proved most successful in the group so far beat its rival 3:1.
					
					The matches go on.

articles.title: Construction of Hospitals Progresses Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Construction of Hospitals Progresses Apace in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The construction of the Children's Hospital and the Dental Hospital are in the final phase in the DPRK.
					They will be equipped with ultra-modern medical apparatuses and furnishings needed for patients as required by the new century.
					
					Soldier-builders of the Children's Hospital are pushing ahead with the plastering of outer walls after finishing the frame construction of the hospital which covers tens of thousands of square meters in total floor space.
					
					Based on the experience gained in speeding up the construction by applying construction methods suited to the specific conditions while economizing lots of materials, a series of rational construction methods have been introduced to profusely pay off. Achievements have also been made in the plastering of inner walls and concrete tamping of ceilings.
					
					Builders of the Dental Hospital have finished the frame construction of structures and roofing in a matter of a few months after the ground was broken for the project.
					
					The plastering of inner walls including ceilings and floors, installing of windows and the frame construction of auxiliary buildings have been simultaneously pushed forward along with the project of tile-setting of outer walls. 
					
					Amid the growing enthusiasm of builders, high-pitched economic agitation drive and aid work, production has been boosted in relevant units in charge of the provision of materials.

articles.title: Rungna Dolphinarium Crowded with Visitors
articles.content:
Rungna Dolphinarium Crowded with Visitors
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Rungna Dolphinarium is one of destinations along with out-door wading pool and amusement facilities in the Rungna People's Pleasure Park, which is located in Rungna Islet on the River Taedong flowing across the heart of the capital city of Pyongyang.
					An increasing number of people have come to the dolphinarium nowadays to enjoy dolphins' stunts.
					
					In particular, synchronized swimming performed by a female trainer and dolphins evokes bursts of cheers from spectators.
					
					Among dolphins' stunts are their movements of greetings as well as their movements redolent of parade.
					
					It is also amazing that dolphins skillfully respond to the spectators' applauses.
					
					Everyone bursts into laughter when a dolphin kisses a girl at a trainer's instruction.
					
					It is said that the number of visitors to the dolphinarium has reached a total of 650 000 since July last year.

articles.title: Japan's Past Crimes Can Never Be Covered Up: News Analyst
articles.content:
Japan's Past Crimes Can Never Be Covered Up: News Analyst
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Evidence proving the crimes committed by Japan in the past is being disclosed without let-up, riveting attention of the international community.
					A diary written by a Korean who worked at a "comfort station" of the Imperial Japanese Army in those days was opened to public on August 6, providing new evidence proving the fact that the sexual slavery enforced by the Japanese imperialists was a state-sponsored crime.
					
					According to it, the command of the Japanese troops dispatched to southern regions requested the command of the Japanese troops in Korea to cooperate in recruiting "comfort women" in May 1942. Many women were taken to battle fields for aggression via Pusan Port and forced into sexual slavery. 
					
					There is a reference in the diary that "comfort stations" of the Imperial Japanese Army were operated under the strict control of the army.
					
					According to KBS of south Korea some days ago, it was confirmed that MacArthur, commander-in-chief of the allied forces in the Pacific, in 1945 worked out a "confidential document" which recorded facts about coercive mobilization of sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					The document titled "Comfort facilities for the Imperial Japanese Army" worked out by the General Command of the Allied Forces on behalf of MacArthur on November 15, 1945 said that the command of the Imperial Japanese Army let Japanese dealers in Korea take Korean women to Myanmar and other countries.
					
					New data on the massacres of Koreans during the great Kanto quake have been disclosed. 
					
					This is evidenced by the account of an interview internet newspaper Thongil News had with Kim Jong Su, permanent representative of the south Korean Solidarity of Citizens for Korean Victims of the 1923 Great Quake in Japan, on July 22. 
					
					He recalled that he made surveys of the places in Tokyo, Chiba, Saitama and Yokohama from July 2 to 6 where Koreans were massacred after the great quake occurred in Kanto area in 1923.
					
					It has been confirmed once again that the Japanese government committed massacres of Koreans by hurling troops, police and "ultra-right organizations" in these areas in those days, he said, adding:
					
					The field survey led to the discovery of photos showing arms, legs and heads of Koreans cut off, which were new findings.
					
					New data were also disclosed at a special lecture given in Tokyo on August 3, 90 years after the mass killings of Koreans by the Japanese imperialists during the great Kanto quake. 
					
					Prof. Masataka Tanaka of Senshu University in the lecture noted that the mass killing of Koreans in Tokyo was spilled over to Chiba, Saitama, Tochigi, Gunma and other areas.  
					
					The rumor which sparked off this mass killing of Koreans, in particular, was spread by radios of the police, prefectural offices and navy of Japan, he added.
					
					KBS of south Korea disclosed on August 14 new data on the fact that the Japanese imperialists distorted song "Arirang" widely known as a symbol of the Korean nation. 
					
					The broadcasting service said Japan systematically distorted the words and music of Arirang in a bid to use it as a means for creating an atmosphere for annexation even before the fabrication of the "Ulsa Five-Point Treaty".
					
					The words of Arirang contained by a photo album released by a Japanese institution in 1905 said that Koreans should agree on annexation as even such a big country as Russia was defeated in the war.
					
					A book written by Japanese Kenjo Okita earlier also seriously distorted the song. 
					
					This was aimed to implant inferiority and the sense of defeat into the minds of the Koreans and benumb their resistance against the Japanese imperialists, KBS added.
					
					Historical facts clearly prove how desperately Japan worked to exterminate the Korean nation.
					
					Prevalent in Japan, however, are Samurai-style outlook on history that "there is no need to feel guilty of the past and the truth of history can be known 100 years later" and even sheer sophism that Japan's colonial and military fascist rule over Korea was "legitimate." 
					
					History will surely indict Japan as long as it goes without redressing its past crimes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ensuring Independence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Ensuring Independence
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Imperialists can not stem the main trend of the times advancing toward independence, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					The article goes on:
					
					Now the progressive people are vigorously advancing along the road of independence, their option, not to make their blood and sweat be used as the plaything of the imperialists and not to be thrown into confusion and disputes again off their road of independence.
					
					The road of independence truly guarantees existence, development and prosperity of humankind.
					
					The history of humankind implicitly shows this truth. This truth gives answers to all the circumstances and complicated situations and serves as an ideological treasured sword for guaranteeing the rosy future of humanity.
					
					This truth has become a formula disclosing the barbarous and brigandish nature and injustice of all the reactionary forces including the imperialists who challenged history. This truth also serves as a torch heralding their ruin.
					
					Independence of countries and nations can be achieved by independent politics.
					
					They can realize independence only when they think their own way, adhere to their own political principle and thus settle all the issues in conformity with the will and interests of their people.
					
					Independence is possible when they foil the moves of the imperialists to violate their sovereignty by their strong material means.
					
					They should augment their national power to achieve victory in their struggle for independence.

articles.title: Suicides of Students Frequent in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suicides of Students Frequent in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Students' suicides frequently occur in south Korea, becoming a serious social problem, according to south Korean CBS.
					139 students of primary, secondary and high schools reportedly committed suicides last year.
					
					Most of them chose suicides, unable to overcome families' destitution.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee posted on its website on Aug. 15 "8. The Triumphal Return" in "Chapter 24 Nationwide Resistance against the Japanese" of Part 1 The Anti-Japanese Revolution Vol. 8 (continuing edition) of President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century"

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits in Liberation of Korea Praised by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits in Liberation of Korea Praised by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- A political party and organizations of different countries and a regional organization posted articles on their websites from Aug. 9 to 15 to mark the 68th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					The Socialist Party of Romania in an article titled "Day of liberation of Korea" said as follows:
					
					On Aug. 15, 1945 the Korean nation was freed from the fate of the colonial slaves of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					President Kim Il Sung, who embarked upon the road of the revolutionary struggle to regain the usurped country in his teens, laid down the line on liberating the country through the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					This made it possible for the Korean people to advance with confidence along the right road in their struggle for liberating the nation for the first time in history.
					
					The President staged the final operation against the Japanese imperialists and achieved the liberation of the country at last.
					
					His exploits of achieving the liberation of Korea with his Songun leadership will shine long in the history of the world struggle for national liberation against imperialism.
					
					The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in its article titled "A noteworthy event in the history of the Korean nation" said as follows:
					
					After the liberation of Korea a wide avenue for building new society opened up before the Korean nation.
					
					The President enforced all the democratic reforms and founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the first people's democratic state in the East.
					
					The DPRK was consolidated and developed into the socialist state centered on the popular masses under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, fully demonstrating its tremendous viability and eternal vitality.
					
					The liberation of Korea that gave birth to everlasting and prosperous socialist Korea will shine long as an event to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, Anti-"Globalization" Movement of Russia, Rostov-Na-Donu Anti－Bourgeois Front, Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and the Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea of Ukraine posted an article titled "Witness by the history" and other articles praising the President's exploits of liberating Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Activities Reported in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Activities Reported in China
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un were reported in China on August 18. 
					The Chinese News Service said supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un visited the construction site of the Ski Resort on Masik Pass.
					
					It went on:
					
					Kim Jong Un expressed his great satisfaction over the fact that the soldier-builders and members of shock brigades of various units have wound up the frame assembling of more than 20 structures by pushing forward it at a high speed despite rough terrains and bad weather in rainy season.
					
					Going round various structures including hotel, service buildings, lodging quarters, skate park, etc., he learnt about the progress made in the construction.
					
					Looking round an 8-storeyed hotel with a 3-storeyed basement, he underscored the need to build all floors and aspects of construction to suit the features of the mountainous area and match its natural environment.
					
					After learning about the project for setting up cableway service, he underlined to step it up so that skiers may use it up to the peak of Taehwa Hill more than 1 360 m above the sea level from the coming winter.
					
					He indicated the tasks to be fulfilled to further accelerate the construction.
					
					It also reported the news that Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un inspected KPA Unit 3404.
					
					It said:
					
					Being briefed on the proud history of the unit, he watched with keen attention historic relics and data conjuring up deep memories. He looked back with deep emotion on the history of the unit's development.
					
					He highly praised the unit for achieving many successes through a dynamic drive for making combat preparations and bolstering up fighting capability, true to the noble intentions of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					He expressed expectation and belief that servicepersons of the unit would successfully discharge their mission and role as standard-bearers and shock brigade upholding the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea before having a photo session with them.
					
					Chinese internet websites People's Network, Economy Network, Xinhua Network, etc. reported the same news.

articles.title: Cuban News Agency Introduces DPRK
articles.content:
Cuban News Agency Introduces DPRK
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Prensa Latina News Agency of Cuba introduced the DPRK on August 9. 
					It gave accounts of the colorful events held in Pyongyang, noting that the DPRK significantly celebrated the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					It went on:
					
					Korea was under the military occupation of Japan in the first half of the last century. 
					
					Japan reduced a lot of Koreans into guinea pigs for biological weapons and forced more than 200,000 women into sexual slavery. 
					
					Korea was liberated in 1945 but it was divided into the north and the south by outside forces. 
					
					The Korean War ignited by the U.S. in June of 1950 lasted three years. 
					
					By the death-defying struggle of the Korean people the U.S. suffered big defeat and was forced to sign the Armistice Agreement in 1953. 
					
					The U.S. and its allied forces became undisguised in their moves to stifle the DPRK at the end of the last century. 
					
					Nevertheless, the DPRK is now dynamically advancing. 
					
					The DPRK government showed the world how it has implemented its space program for peaceful purposes.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Arab Organization
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Arab Organization
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- The Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea made public a statement in support of the just cause of the Korean people on Aug. 13. 
					The statement expressed full solidarity with the DPRK victoriously advancing under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					It went on:
					
					Bright and rosy is the future of the DPRK built by President Kim Il Sung, eternal sun of Juche. 
					
					Nothing can shield the rays of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. 
					
					Juche Korea will remain as a dignified and orderly country, motherland of Songun and example of the free world no matter how desperately the imperialists and reactionaries may try to stifle it. 
					
					Socialism centered on the popular masses will shine in the world as vibrant, free and prosperous society under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Songun Politics in DPRK Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Songun Politics in DPRK Praised Abroad
Pyongyang, August 21 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups to mark the 53rd anniversary of the start of the Songun revolutionary leadership by Kim Jong Il. 
					A Nepali paper on Aug. 16 carried an article "For peace" with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					The paper in an article sub-titled "For most precious peace" said it is impossible to protect the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation, far from defending peace, when its might is weak. The DPRK is looking to directing efforts to economic construction and improving the people's living standard in peaceful environment, it added. 
					
					The Bangladeshi paper The Daily Folk on Aug. 15 carried an article titled "Immortal Songun exploits" which said:
					
					Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership on Aug. 25, 1960. 
					
					Under his Songun revolutionary leadership the army and people of the DPRK formed the invincible single-minded unity around the party. 
					
					His Songun revolutionary leadership is being successfully carried forward by Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un. 
					
					The Cambodian F. M. 90.5 Radio on Aug. 13 reported an article titled "Songun politics is example of independent politics". 
					
					The Songun politics of the DPRK is one for protecting and achieving independence of the country and nation and reflecting independent demand and desire of the popular masses, it said, and went on:
					
					The DPRK put forward the army as the driving force of the revolution as it has the revolutionary spirit, sense of organization and combat capability stronger than any other class and social strata. 
					
					The Songun politics of the DPRK is the example of independent politics for decisively countering without the slightest concession or compromise the acts hurting its sovereignty and dignity.

articles.title: Transcurre con exito exposicion internacional de mercancias de Rason
articles.content:
Transcurre con exito exposicion internacional de mercancias de Rason
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- Esta en plena marcha la 3a Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason.
					En la presente feria, inaugurada el dia 19 en la zona economica comercial de Rason en las fronteras con China y Rusia en el norte del pais, toman parte mas de 120 unidades provenientes de varios paises y regiones incluyendo RPDC, China, Rusia, Alemania, Estados Unidos y Japon.
					
					Se exhibieron mas de 78 mil productos de mas de 410 variedades, tales como equipos mecanicos, productos de acero, articulos electricos y electronicos, mercancias de industria ligera, alimentos y articulos de uso diario, medicamentos, materiales de construccion, productos quimicos y medios de transporte.
					
					Hwang Chol Nam, vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Rason, dijo que la ciudad ha preparado ambiente favorable para la produccion y el comercio exterior de las empresas y companias de varios paises y regiones al establecer firmemente la garantia institucional y la base juridica para el desarrollo conjunto y la activacion de la zona y al acelerar la construccion de infraestructura.
					
					Durante la feria, los empresarios extranjeros experimentaran con ojos propios el proceso de desarrollo de la zona y lograran el desarrollo conjunto y la prosperidad a traves de los contactos y transacciones multilaterales y eficientes, senalo.
					
					Ho Myong Ho, director de la Agencia de Exposiciones de Rason, destaco que la dimension y la calidad de los articulos exhibidos en la feria comprueban que esta centra la atencion de los empresarios de muchos paises. Anadio que la feria deviene buena oportunidad para fomentar la amistad y unidad y desarrollar el comercio entre los paises y regiones.
					
					La exposicion continuara hasta el dia 23.
					
					La zona economica comercial de Rason es la especial de la RPDC donde se practica la politica de prerrogativas economicas.
					
					Actualmente, ella se desarrolla como emporio internacional de transporte intermediario, comercio e inversion, finanzas, turismo y servicio.

articles.title: Se construyen en RPDC nuevos hospitales
articles.content:
Se construyen en RPDC nuevos hospitales
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- Se construyen magnificamente en esta capital el Hospital de Pediatria y el de Estomatologia.
					Estos centros sanitarios seran amueblados con equipos medicos de punta y articulos necesarios a la vida de enfermos.
					
					Los constructores militares terminaron la edificacion de armadura del hospital de pediatria con una superficie arquitectonica de decenas de miles metros cuadrados e impulsan en etapa final el repello de la parte exterior.
					
					Se crearon y se introdujeron de continuo los racionales metodos de construccion a base de las experiencias de haber ahorrado muchos materiales y elevado la velocidad de la obra y se logran exitos en el repello interior y el apisonamiento de hormigon de doble tejado.
					
					Los constructores del Hospital de Estomatologia terminaron durante unos meses la obra de armadura de edificio y la cubierta de tejado.
					
					Se impulsan simultaneamente el repello del interior, la instalacion de ventana, la obra de armadura del edificio auxiliar y la puesta de azulejos en la pared exterior del edificio.
					
					Se registra auge tambien en las unidades productoras de los materiales de construccion necesarios y se dinamizan la agitacion economica y la asistencia a los constructores.

articles.title: Son inocultables crimenes del pasado de Japon, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Son inocultables crimenes del pasado de Japon, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- En estos momentos, se revelan de continuo los testigos de los crimenes del pasado de Japon, llamando la atencion de la sociedad internacional. 
					Se dio a la publicidad el pasado dia 6 el diario de un coreano quien trabajaba en el "centro de consoladoras" para el viejo ejercito japones. 
					
					El diario presento nuevos datos que evidencian el caso de esclavitud sexual de Japon de aquel entonces como un crimen estatal.
					
					Segun la nota, en mayo de 1942, la comandancia de las tropas japonesas enviadas a la region meridional solicito a la comandancia de sus tropas estacionadas en Corea a brindar la cooperacion en el reclutamiento de esclavas sexuales.
					
					Por esta solicitud, muchas mujeres fueron arrestadas por via del puerto de Pusan a los campos de combate y sufrieron una vida de esclavas sexuales.
					
					Los "centros de consoladoras" operaron bajo el control del ejercito japones.
					
					Hace dias, la radio surcoreana KBS transmitio que en 1945, el entonces comandante en jefe de  las fuerzas aliadas de la region de Asia-Pacifico, MacArthur, elaboro un "documento  confidencial" sobre el caracter forzoso del caso de esclavitud sexual cometido por el imperialismo japones. 
					
					Un documento elaborado el 15 de noviembre de 1945 por la comandancia general de las fuerzas aliadas en nombre de MacArthur narra que la comandancia de las tropas japonesas  instigo a los intermediarios japoneses para llevar a las mujeres coreanas a Myanmar y otros paises. 
					
					Se revelan nuevos datos sobre la masacre a los coreanos cometida por los imperialistas japoneses en el periodo de gran terremoto en Kanto.
					
					En una rueda de prensa con el periodico online Thongil News, sostenida el 22 de julio pasado, el representante permanente de la Solidaridad Surcoreana de Ciudadanos para Victimas Coreanas en 1923, Kim Jong Su, dijo que con motivo del gran terremoto en Kanto ocurrido en 1923, el mismo averiguo desde el dia 2 al 6 de julio Tokio, Chiba, Saitama y Yokohama donde se cometio la masacre a los coreanos. 
					
					Expuso que esta vez pudo confirmar otra vez que en aquel entonces el gobierno japones perpetro la matanza a los coreanos movilizando el ejercito, la policia y las organizaciones civiles reaccionarias.
					
					Con motivo del 90o aniversario de masacre a los coreanos durante el gran terremoto en Kanto, se impartio el pasado dia 3 en Tokio una conferencia especial, ocasion en la cual se presentaron nuevos testigos.
					
					Masataka Tanaka, profesor de la Universidad de Senshu, revelo que la masacre a los coreanos se inicio en Tokio y se extendio a Chiba, Saitama, Tochigi, Gunma, etc. y que las mentiras que instigaron a matar a los coreanos se divulgaron por via inalambrica de policia y las fuerzas navales de Japon.
					
					Los imperialistas japoneses tergiversaron la cancion "Arirang", reconocida como simbolo de la nacion coreana, reporto el pasado dia 14 la cadena surcoreana KBS. 
					
					Segun el medio surcoreano, desde antes de inventar el "Tratado de 5 Puntos de Ulsa", Japon tergiverso el contenido de la cancion "Arirang" con el fin de utilizarla como un medio para crear el ambiente de anexion de Corea al pais isla. 
					
					La letra de "Arirang", insertada en un album emitido en 1905 por un organo japones, se trataba de que los coreanos deberian aceptar la anexion del pais a Japon, ya que fueron derrotadas en la guerra las potencias como Rusia, revelo.
					
					Con anterioridad, el japones Kenjo Okita tambien tergiverso malignamente en su libro la letra de "Arirang", anuncio y lo califico de intento de Japon de infundir a los coreanos la bajeza y la conciencia de derrota y exterminar el sentimiento de resistencia a Japon. 
					
					Tales hechos historicos demuestran cuan persistente y cruel fue la campana de Japon destinada a exterminar a la nacion coreana. 
					
					Sin embargo, en Japon reina la concepcion de la historia al estilo de samurais como "no hace  falta sentir la culpabilidad por el pasado" y "la historia puede esclarecer la verdad despues de un siglo" y se justifica la dominacion colonial fascista y militar sobre Corea. 
					
					Mientras que Japon no liquide el pasado criminal, continuaran las acusaciones de la historia contra el pais isla.

articles.title: No se podra detener corriente por independencia, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No se podra detener corriente por independencia, destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 21 de agosto (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala como sigue:
					Los imperialistas no podran detener con nada la corriente principal de la epoca por la independencia.
					
					Hoy, los pueblos progresistas avanzan por el camino de la independencia optado por si mismo para que su sangre y sudor no se conviertan en juguete de los imperialistas ni sufran caos y conflictos desviandose de su camino.
					
					La independencia garantiza la existencia, el desarrollo y la prosperidad de la humanidad.
					
					Esta verdad sintetiza la historia de la humanidad, la respuesta para resolver todos los estados y la situacion complicada de hoy y el medio omnipotente ideologico que ilumina el futuro de la humanidad.
					
					Ademas, revela la brutalidad, el caracter bandidesco y la injusticia del imperialismo y otras fuerzas reaccionarias que desafian a la historia y prenuncia el arruinamiento de ellos.
					
					La independencia del pais y la nacion se realiza con la politica independiente.
					
					Cuando se piensa con su propio cerebro y se resuelva con el propio criterio politico todos los asuntos conforme a la voluntad e interes de su pueblo se puede realizar la independencia del pais y la nacion.
					
					Al frustrar con los poderosos medios fisicos las maniobras de los imperialistas tendentes a violar la soberania se realiza la independencia del pais y la nacion.
					
					Para ganar la victoria en la lucha por la independencia hay que formar la poderosa fuerza nacional.
